body_html:
and afaik, wheel hashes are stored in the dist-info dirs RECORD file:

sh-3.2# unzip -p torch-0.2.0.post3-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl torch-0.2.0.post3.dist-info/RECORD | grep torch/lib/libTHC.so.1
torch/lib/libTHC.so.1,sha256=bV7nnfy_NgT67MGE_b4t4iWR285M1kVBpL6F-u4quiU,271135764

thanks!
body_text:
and afaik, wheel hashes are stored in the dist-info dirs RECORD file:
sh-3.2# unzip -p torch-0.2.0.post3-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl torch-0.2.0.post3.dist-info/RECORD | grep torch/lib/libTHC.so.1

body:
and afaik, wheel hashes are stored in the dist-info dirs `RECORD` file:

```
sh-3.2# unzip -p torch-0.2.0.post3-cp27-cp27mu-manylinux1_x86_64.whl torch-0.2.0.post3.dist-info/RECORD | grep torch/lib/libTHC.so.1
torch/lib/libTHC.so.1,sha256=bV7nnfy_NgT67MGE_b4t4iWR285M1kVBpL6F-u4quiU,271135764
```

thanks!
